name: part_006
file: tmp_【#TheBrokenPromise】hololive English -Promise- 1st Anniversary Musical： The Broken Promise [Oi0WDyT6xTE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: IRyS walks through a town square, reflecting on her lack of grace and control compared to others.
IRyS performs a song on a stage built from a giant book, surrounded by a cheering audience.
A transition scene where the pages of a giant book turn, leading into a new setting.
Ouro Kronii is in a church, humming to herself, before being addressed by a priest.

subtitles.original: 'Tis a blight, a stain upon my soul.
subtitles.english: 'Tis a blight, a stain upon my soul.

subtitles.original: My ambitions can never reach their full potential in this state.
subtitles.english: My ambitions can never reach their full potential in this state.

subtitles.original: How can I ever be taken seriously when I can't control my limbs?
subtitles.english: How can I ever be taken seriously when I can't control my limbs?

subtitles.original: I am a mockery, a joke to be pitied and scorned.
subtitles.english: I am a mockery, a joke to be pitied and scorned.

subtitles.original: Oh, to possess such grace.
subtitles.english: Oh, to possess such grace.

subtitles.original: I'd trade my soul for it.
subtitles.english: I'd trade my soul for it.

subtitles.original: Are there any devils I can trade my soul with to be as perfect as her?
subtitles.english: Are there any devils I can trade my soul with to be as perfect as her?

subtitles.original: Would that it were so easy.
subtitles.english: Would that it were so easy.

subtitles.original: Oh my God
subtitles.english: Oh my God

subtitles.original: 愛のネタバレ「別れ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Love's spoiler, feels like a "breakup"

subtitles.original: 人生のネタバレ「死ぬ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Life's spoiler, feels like "death"

subtitles.original: なにそれ意味深でかっこいいじゃん…
subtitles.english: What's that? It's so meaningful and cool...

subtitles.original: それっぽい単語集で踊ってんだ　失敬
subtitles.english: Dancing with a glossary of similar words, excuse me

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな
subtitles.english: God-ish

subtitles.original: Lyrics, Music: ピノキオピー
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music: PinocchioP

subtitles.original: もういいぜ　もういいぜ　それもいいぜ　もういいぜ　逆に
subtitles.english: Enough, enough, that's enough, enough, on the contrary

subtitles.original: 興奮してきたなあ
subtitles.english: I'm getting excited

subtitles.original: おっきいね　おっきいね　夢　おっきいね　おっきいね
subtitles.english: It's big, it's big, the dream is big, it's big

subtitles.original: 景気いいけど　品性はTHE END
subtitles.english: It's booming, but dignity is THE END

subtitles.original: うええい　うええい
subtitles.english: Yay, yay

subtitles.original: " Gott ist tot "
subtitles.english: God is dead

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな　それ　卑怯　神っぽいな　それ
subtitles.english: That's god-ish, unfair, that's god-ish

subtitles.original: アイウォンチュー　ウォンチュー　IQが下がっていく感じ
subtitles.english: I want you, want you, the feeling of IQ dropping

subtitles.original: 邪心っぽいな　それ　畢慶　邪心っぽいな　それ
subtitles.english: That's wicked-ish, ultimately, that's wicked-ish

subtitles.original: "My God"
subtitles.english: "My God"

subtitles.original: アイヘイチュー　ヘイチュー　害虫はどっち
subtitles.english: I hate you, hate you, which one is the pest?

subtitles.original: その髪型　その目　その口元　その香水　その服　そのメイク
subtitles.english: That hairstyle, those eyes, that mouth, that perfume, those clothes, that makeup

subtitles.original: アレっぽいな　それ　卑怯　アレっぽいな　それ～
subtitles.english: That's like that, unfair, that's like that~

subtitles.original: その名言　その意見　その批評　そのカリスマ　そのギャグ　そのセンス
subtitles.english: That quote, that opinion, that criticism, that charisma, that gag, that sense

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな　それ　卑怯　ぽいな　ぽいな　ぽい　憧れちゃう！
subtitles.english: That's god-ish, unfair, -ish, -ish, -ish, I'm admiring it!

subtitles.original: メタ思考する本質は悪意？　人を小馬鹿にしたような作為
subtitles.english: Is the essence of meta-thinking malice? A maneuver as if to belittle people

subtitles.original: 無為に生き延びるのは難しい　権力に飲まれて揺らぐ灯
subtitles.english: Surviving in vain is difficult, a light flickering being swallowed by power

subtitles.original: 神を否定し神に成り代わり　玉座で豹変する小物達
subtitles.english: Denying God and becoming God, small fry who undergo a sudden change on the throne

subtitles.original: 批判に見せかけ自戒の祈り
subtitles.english: A prayer of self-reflection disguised as criticism

subtitles.original: Do you know?
subtitles.english: Do you know?

subtitles.original: 何言ってんの？それ　ウザい　何言ってんの？それ
subtitles.english: What are you saying? That's annoying, what are you saying?

subtitles.original: 意味がよくわかんないし　眠っちゃうよ　マジ
subtitles.english: I don't really get the meaning, and I'll fall asleep, seriously

subtitles.original: 飽きっぽいんだ　オーケー　みんな　飽きっぽいんだ　オーケー
subtitles.english: I'm fickle, okay, everyone is fickle, okay

subtitles.original: 踊れるやつ　ちょうだい　ちょうだい　ビーム
subtitles.english: Give me someone who can dance, give me, give me, beam

subtitles.original: キッショいね　キッショいね　それ　キッショいね　キッショいね　逆に
subtitles.english: It's gross, it's gross, that's gross, it's gross, on the contrary

subtitles.original: 逆にファンになってきたじゃん
subtitles.english: I've become a fan, haven't I?

subtitles.original: ちっちゃいね　ちっちゃいね　器　ちっちゃいね　ちっちゃいね
subtitles.english: It's small, it's small, the vessel is small, it's small

subtitles.original: 天才ゆえ孤独ですね　かっけぇ…　かっけぇ…
subtitles.english: Lonely because you're a genius, cool... cool...

subtitles.original: "Gott ist tot"
subtitles.english: God is dead

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな　それ　卑怯　神っぽいな　それ
subtitles.english: That's god-ish, unfair, that's god-ish

subtitles.original: "My God"
subtitles.english: "My God"

subtitles.original: 超健康　健康　言い張って　くたばっていく感じ
subtitles.english: Insisting on super health, health, the feeling of kicking the bucket

subtitles.original: ヤケっぽいな　それ　畢竟　ヤケっぽいな　それ
subtitles.english: That's desperate-ish, ultimately, that's desperate-ish

subtitles.original: もう哀愁　哀愁　エピゴーネンのヒール
subtitles.english: Already sorrow, sorrow, the heel of an epigone

subtitles.original: そのタイトル　その絵　そのストーリー　その音楽　その歌　そのメロディ
subtitles.english: That title, that picture, that story, that music, that song, that melody

subtitles.original: アレっぽいな　それ　卑怯　アレっぽいな　それ
subtitles.english: That's like that, unfair, that's like that

subtitles.original: その名言　その意見　その批評　そのカリスマ　そのギャグ　そのセンス
subtitles.english: That quote, that opinion, that criticism, that charisma, that gag, that sense

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな　それ　卑怯　ぽいな　ぽいな　ぽい　憧れちゃうわ！
subtitles.english: That's god-ish, unfair, -ish, -ish, -ish, I'm admiring it!

subtitles.original: 愛のネタバレ「別れ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Love's spoiler, feels like a "breakup"

subtitles.original: 人生のネタバレ「死ぬ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Life's spoiler, feels like "death"

subtitles.original: すべて理解してしまった
subtitles.english: I've understood everything

subtitles.original: 無邪気に踊っていたかった　人生
subtitles.english: I wanted to dance innocently, life

subtitles.original: (Humming)
subtitles.english: (Humming)

subtitles.original: Thine angelic humming speaks of a great darkness in you.
subtitles.english: Thine angelic humming speaks of a great darkness in you.

subtitles.original: Thou oughtst sing more to expel the demons within.
subtitles.english: Thou oughtst sing more to expel the demons within.

subtitles.original: Demons? I have not any demons,
subtitles.english: Demons? I have not any demons,

subtitles.original: but I thank thee for the compliment.
subtitles.english: but I thank thee for the compliment.

subtitles.original: Or thou anew?
subtitles.english: Or thou anew?

subtitles.original: I'm married to the church, I'm afraid.
subtitles.english: I'm married to the church, I'm afraid.

subtitles.original: We're about to begin rehearsal.
subtitles.english: We're about to begin rehearsal.

subtitles.original: Take up that hymnal and join us.
subtitles.english: Take up that hymnal and join us.
